name: FxProjectAPI
desc: Methods you use to get information about the project in which your plug-in instance is running.

items.name: func mediaFolderURL(AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSURL?>!)
items.desc: Provides the security-scoped URL for a plug-in data folder within a project’s media folder.

items.name: func documentID(UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>!)
items.desc: Provides the document ID number of the host’s project.
